column5: OFF ON ANOTHER ADVENTURE TOMOR LOOKIN FOR SOME WHITIES!!! NEVER CAUGHT ONE BEFORE SO I'M HOPIN FOR SOME ACTION!! TX TO AN ASWOME INVITE FROM BIG CHEV,  ME AND LITTLE C WILL BE KICKIN IT IN A NICE WARM HUT!!! IM SPOILED NOW AND NEVER WANT TO STAND OUT IN THE COLD AGAIN  LOL  I MADE THE MISTAKE OF TELLIN LITTLE C HE GETS TO GO OUT ON BIG CHEV'S 4 WHEELER! DO KIDS COME WITH AN OFF SWITCH??LOL  HOPE TO HAVE SOME FISH PICS FOR YA WHEN WE GET BACK!! GOOD LUCK IF YOUR HEADIN OUT TOMOR!!
Someone asked this question in a not so long ago post, but it bears repeating:  DO YOU FLIPPIN' WORK??  Just kidding Scott, go get 'em, you couldn't be going fishing with a greater guy.
hey maybe he is like me and only work 13 days a month and have the rest off  mind you I work a 12 hr day though

WELL JUST TO KILL CURIOSITY IM A HEAVY EQUIPMENT OPERATOR (LOCAL 793) WORK 6 MONTHS 12HR DAYS 6 DAYS A WEEK!! I CAN SEE A WHOLE BUNCH OF NEW RECRUITS COMIN TO THE UNION AFTER THIS  LOL (IF YA LIKE FISHIN IN THE SUMMER DO NOT APPLY LOL)
I like summer fishing CC, so your job is safe from me, lol.
Me too, I prefer summer fishing, so you won't see me trying to sign up, but that's a perfect job for a steelheader!  Mike
Look forward to your report Scott.
